name: RiskCube
long_description:
Problem: Venture-backed startups are underserved by the traditional insurance market and limited to single-quote insurance carrier, leading to opaque pricing and suboptimal coverage.

Solution: RiskCube is an independent, AI-native comparison platform that provides founders with multi-carrier quote comparison, enabling transparent, data-driven insurance decisions.

Unfair Advantage: Our platform is built on proprietary risk models designed by our founder, a risk & insurance expert and former member of the WTW Risk & Analytics division. This expertise allows us to identify and price startup risks that generalist brokers miss.

Result: We leverage AI and quantitative analysis to ensure compliance and reduce total cost of risk for venture-backed startups.
